Title: Phases out the sale of products that contain intentionally added PFAS
Summary: Phases out the sale of products that contain intentionally added PFAS.
LawCode: Add Art 37 Title 4 §§37-0401 - 37-0413, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to phasing out the sale of products that contain intentionally added PFAS
